jumbotron.conference: XII Latin American Conference on Human–Computer Interaction

about.about_text:
We warmly welcome you to the official website of the 12th Latin American Conference on Human-Computer Interaction (CLIHC 2026). This space is intended for everyone interested in participating as speakers, authors, attendees, collaborators, and/or sponsors in the most important meeting within the field of Human-Computer Interaction (HCI) in Latin America.

In 2026, CLIHC will be held in a distributed format, with two in-person satellite events that reflect the diversity, richness, and plurality of our academic and professional communities:

  • In Aracaju, state of Sergipe, Brazil, under the leadership of Dr. Jean Clemisson Santos Rosa and Dr. Gilton José Ferreira da Silva.
  • In the City of Oaxaca, state of Oaxaca, Mexico, under the leadership of Mtro. Carlos Alberto Martínez Sandoval and Dr. Mario Alberto Moreno Rocha.

Each venue will have its own local general coordination team, a program specifically designed for its context, and particular event dates. Some tracks will be shared between both venues, while others have been independently defined, allowing participants to engage in and enjoy both events.

To ensure effective integration between teams and to guarantee a coherent and inclusive experience at CLIHC 2026, a General Articulation Committee was established, working closely with the local coordination teams. This committee is facilitated by Dr. Soraia Silva Prietch and Dr. Pedro Reynolds-Cuéllar.

We invite you to explore this website to learn about key dates, active calls, and the different ways to participate. It will be a pleasure to have your presence and contribution at CLIHC 2026.

organizers.title: Organizers
organizers.intro: The primary objective of the 2026 Latin American Conference on Human-Computer Interaction (CLIHC) is to foster collaboration, discussion, and knowledge exchange among international and Latin American HCI researchers. The conference aims to promote human-centered and culturally aware artificial intelligence design and development, and provide a platform for the presentation and discussion of new ideas, methods, and techniques for designing interactive user experiences. The conference will be held in Puebla, Mexico, and is organized by a diverse group of experts from Latin America and beyond.
organizers.conference_chairs_description: Leading the organization and coordination of the conference program and activities.
organizers.local_chairs_description: Responsible for overseeing local arrangements and logistics for the conference.
organizers.program_chairs_description: Responsible for the conference program and paper selection process.
organizers.full_papers_cahirs_description: Responsible for the call, guidelines, peer-review management, and final editorial decisions for full papers.
organizers.short_papers_cahirs_description: Responsible for the call, guidelines, peer-review management, and final editorial decisions for short papers.
organizers.student_design_competition_description: In charge of organizing the Student Design Competition.
organizers.graduate_colloquium_chairs_description: Oversees the organization of the graduate colloquium track.
organizers.workshops_and_tutorials_chairs_descripti: Responsible for coordinating and overseeing the workshops and tutorials sessions.
organizers.posters_chairs_description: Responsible for overseeing all aspects related to the poster session.
organizers.publicity_chair_description: In charge of managing and promoting the conference's publicity and outreach efforts.
organizers.web_chairs_description: Responsible for the design, development, and maintenance of the conference website.
organizers.volunteer_students_chair_description: In charge of managing and coordinating volunteer students for the conference.
organizers.acccessibility_chairs_description: Responsible for overseeing comprehensive accessibility measures during the conference.
organizers.steering_committee_description: Oversees and guides the strategic activities of the LAIHC community and the CLIHC conference.
organizers.diversity_and_inclusion_chairs_descripti: Promotes inclusion, equity, and diverse representation within the conference.
organizers.atalaia_description: Organizes and coordinates the special workshop An Afternoon in: Atalaia, fostering local exchange and academic collaboration.
